document.full_text: in abidjan, areas held by forces loyal to laurent gbagbo, as well as the entrenched strongman's residence, were struck by missiles fired from helicopters.
document.title: france and u.n. hit ivory coast strongman's home and palace
lines_and_colors: in abidjan, areas held by forces loyal to laurent gbagbo, as well as the entrenched strongman's residence, were struck by missiles fired from helicopters.
